entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [SqlClient] Update 8.0 to 5.1.5 #33010
    7.0.x
  • Read Description String Into Generated Xml Comments When Scaffolding MS SQL Database #33051
  • Perf bottleneck because of SortedDictionary in Annotatable.FindAnnotation #25488
    9.0.0-preview1

Updated

  • Unfulfillable nullable contraints are set for complex types with TPH entities #33004
    8.0.x
  • `Select` projection with an (uncorrelated) subquery produces two separate SQL queries #33012
    9.0.0
  • Ephemeral/Shadow navigation properties or other mechanism of automatic joins. #32658
  • Complex type comparison to inline instance doesn't work if some properties aren't listed inline #32988
  • Returning `SqlFragmentExpression` from `HasTranslation` doesn't work (switches to client evaluation) #32969
  • Cosmos: Narrow gap between EF and SDK LINQ provider #25764
  • Scaffolding doesn't work with the latest version of Mono.TextTemplating #32385
    9.0.0-preview2
  • ArgumentException thrown when building queries involving owned entities mapped with .ToJson() #33046
  • Use inheritance instead of annotations for TableExpressionBase (specifically temporal tables) #33044
  • Deliver highly-requested user features for EF Core #24107
    Backlog
  • Improvements to model building and conventions #22952
    Backlog
  • Improve experience deploying databases created by Migrations #19587
    Backlog
  • EF Core database provider for Azure Cosmos DB #33033
  • Enable more value object scenarios #31238
    Backlog
  • Revisit tools architecture #18840
    Backlog
  • The database default created by Migrations for primitive collections mapped to JSON is invalid #32972
    8.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #33004 - Unfulfillable nullable contraints are set for complextypes with TPH entities #33054
    Servicing-consider
  • Allow SqlFragmentExpression to have Type/type mapping #33053
  • [TEST ONLY] moving tests for #32972 to relational so we also test SqLite #33050
    auto-merge
  • Add OptimizeContext MSBuild target #33049
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #32972 - The database default created by Migrations for primitive collections mapped to JSON is invalid #33048
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Fix to #33004 - Unfulfillable nullable contraints are set for complex types with TPH entities #33052
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #33047
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix to #32972 - The database default created by Migrations for primitive collections mapped to JSON is invalid #33039
